DOC.brief_summary: A 53-week study to determine the effect of montelukast sodium when given to children (with infrequent episodic asthma) at the earliest symptoms of an acute episode of asthma.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Determine the Effect of Montelukast Sodium as an Episode Modifier in the Treatment of Infrequent Episodic Asthma in Children (0476-165)
DOC.criteria: Males or females between the ages of 2 and 14 who have infrequent episodic asthma.
